extendedInfo.description: Saving Private Sheep is back in this wacky free brain & puzzle game!The war is over. After fierce combat, those damned wolves have gone back home with their tails between their legsâ¦Once more, sheep can graze with great delight and plenty of new wool!Â But let's not forget the foxes, those nasty creatures that have come to kidnap the poor, innocent little sheepâ¦Fortunately, General Sheepard is there to keep an eye on the sheepfold!Armed with a catapult and a hedgehog, the flock's leading military figure dispatches a small commando team to restore peace in the pastures.Use your catapult, go from one sheep to the next, and knock those foxes flying.Â Avoid the obstacles in your path and don't put a hoof wrong, soldier, because the enemy is well hidden!You think it's easy then? We'll soon see about that, palâ¦*** SAVING PRIVATE SHEEP 2 CONTAINS A LEVEL EDITOR ***- CREATE your own levels using the level editor used by our game designers- SHARE your finest levels using the Premium option and receive ratings from other players- GAIN regular access to new community levels using the Premium optionFEATURES:66 danger-filled levels: chickens, waterfalls, spider's webs, spikes, etc.New permanent levels thanks to the level editorLoads of gadgets: parachutes, chili peppers, jetpacks, pipes, beehives, etc.Extra skins and ammunition thanks to the objects collected during the gameExperience a great adventure with 60 danger-filled levels: chickens, waterfalls, spider's webs, spikes, etc.Discover loads of gadgets: parachutes, chili peppers, jetpacks, beehives, etc.Check out the free Saving Private Sheep 2 game now!

reviews.title: For kids.. but you\'ll have to buy ammo when they run out
reviews.comment: It was an ok game at first but was too easy..... and then I ran out of ammo. You have to buy get extra ammo in this game by completing offers or by purchases. It loses a star for that. Good game for kids 10 and under but I doubt it\'ll hold their attention for long.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can not aim properly
reviews.comment: Aiming is too bad .. Can not control smoothly.

reviews.title: Not gonna buy more ammo.
reviews.comment: Went through all my ammo and it said it would replenish the next day.  It didnt and now I can only get the screento buy more ammo.  Useless.  It was a very fun game while I did have ammo though.

reviews.title: Shameful attempt at a sequel
reviews.comment: I LOVED the first game. It was amazing and I played through the end. The sequel? Horrible. You shouldn\'t have ruined what you had.
